name: Hasty Golf
description:
Welcome to "Hasty Golf" - a procedural game

---How to play---

start spotify, turn up your favorite songs and have a great time improving your highscore ;)

hold left mouse on ball, drag (power increases with distance), let go of left mouse and watch it roll

pressright mouse at any time to reset your ball to start

press left or right mouse at endscreen to restart game

---Description---

This game has no text, creates a stressful feeling and delivers unlimited playtime with procedural level generation. The further you get the harder it will be to reach the hole... But be aware that there will alway be a solution ;)

---Future plans---

I am currently working on a follow-up of this game. It may take a while since i can only work on it in my freetime but you can play it soon...

---Thanks---

Thanks a lot for playing, donating and commenting. You help me keep developing and improving my work :)

---Apologies---

This is my first game, so it may contain bugs or seem unfinished...
